mapper.select: select month(evaluate_time) as month, count(*) as count from smart_evaluate_window where year(evaluate_time)= #{year} group by year(evaluate_time), month(evaluate_time)

select i.item_text as keyName,count(*) as value from smart_evaluate_window as e,sys_dict as d,sys_dict_item as i where e.evaluate_result = i.item_value and d.dict_code = 'evaluate_grade' and i.dict_id = d.id and year(evaluate_time)= #{year} group by e.evaluate_result,i.item_text
select windows_name as keyName,count(*) as value from smart_evaluate_window where year(evaluate_time)= #{year} group by windows_name order by value desc
select windows_name as keyName,avg(evaluate_result) as value from smart_evaluate_window where year(evaluate_time)= #{year} group by windows_name order by value desc
